title: Galio Yorick Interaction.
body:
Galio's dash _(stopped by terrain)_ seems to be stopped by an allied Yorick's wall.

Which is odd, seeming you can walk through it normally if he is on your team.
Is this intended?

_I haven't tried this with Azir's wall yet, but what is affected by Yorick's wall, should be the same with Azir's, i would imagine._
